H0.text: Methanogens act as decomposers in sewage treatment plants.

H1.text: Creators are methanogens that act in sewage treatment plants.

H2.text: Fertilizers are what methanogens act as in sewage treatment plants.

H3.text: Killers are what methanogens act as in sewage treatment plants.

A4.text: In anaerobic system, the majority of the chemical energy contained within the starting material is released by methanogenic archaea as methane.

A5.text: In this instance, there may be a pasteurisation or sterilisation stage prior to digestion or between the two digestion tanks.
